page.title: 18Richmond Hill School 2
page.content: We have puppet theatres visit school and sometimes we go up to Beacon Hill school to see drama or music performed by groups of professional travelling players. We also go on week long educational trips to the county outdoor pursuits centres at Hawwse End and Fellside. We also go to places like London, Minehead, Pwllheli and Barry Island. The last two places are for Venture Weeks at Butlin's camps where we get a chance to try sports and activities we cannot do here. We play football and netball against schools within a ten mile radius, also we take part in cross-country competitions. The school itself was built in 1894 and has a dining hall and two classrooms built in the 1940's.We have a large playing field.
